subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Camargue: Explore the unique wetlands on horseback or by bike. • Mont Ventoux: Challenge yourself with a hike or bike ride up this iconic mountain. • Gorges du Tarn: Hike through dramatic gorges and enjoy breathtaking views. • Water Activities Ardèche River: Paddle through the stunning Ardèche Gorge. • Dordogne River: Enjoy a leisurely canoe trip, passing by medieval castles and • charming villages. Ubaye River: Experience white-water rafting for an adrenaline rush. • Gorges du Verdon: Rent a kayak or paddleboat to explore the turquoise waters. • Lake Sainte-Croix: Enjoy swimming, sailing, and windsurfing on this beautiful lake. • Lake Serre-Ponçon: Try water skiing or wakeboarding on one of the largest artificial • lakes in Europe. Cévennes National Park: Go canyoning in the rugged terrain of this beautiful park. •
